name: Best Friend (Forever!)
description: My Best Friend Today I found a friend, Who knew everything I felt. She knew my every weakness, And the problems I’ve been dealt. She understood my wonders, And listened to my dreams. She listened to how I felt about life and love, And knew what it all means. I went to hold her To pull her a bit nearer And realized that this perfect friend I found Was a warm scarf. Details: Hand-selected domestic wools and acrylics Long fringe

name: Candy Land
description: In the mood for something sweet? This scarf will satisfy your sweet tooth and never cause you to gain an ounce – unless the ounce or two is the weight from the scarf around your neck. In flavors of raspberry, toffee and lime, it lets you indulge to your heart’s content. It’s light and fluffy on the palate, and no more than 6-feet of calories. Details: Hand-selected European and domestic cottons and acrylics. Length – 6ft No fringe

name: Nubbly Knots
description: Know the nuance of nubbly knots. Not just for the nascent, navel-gazing Newfies named Nancy, Naomi, Nelly, or Noula. Poor Noula! It’s cold in Newfoundland and these vibrantly colored, softly plush 7-foot scarves are just what the doctor ordered for those overcast cloudy winter days. Details: Hand-selected Italian and Belgian wools and acrylics. Length – 7ft Long fringe

name: Tibetan Sherpa
description: The wind is blowing. You pull your scarf tighter. Like a sherpa guiding you up the slope of the Himalayas, your scarf is with you all the way until you reach the summit. Knit with charcoal, warm reds and pinks, your scarf will be soft and plush with enough bulk to make you feel daring. Selected yarns are used to soulfully create this 6-feet sans fringe scarf that will be your guide, your sherpa, through the winter. Details: Hand-selected Canadian wools and acrylics Length – 6ft No fringe

name: Winter Glitz
description: Starlight, starbright, the first star I see tonight is a shimmer, a twinkle, a glitz of light. No, it’s not a star or a street lamp but an unexpected magical night. So glitz it up with a splash of metallics for an evening that will be bright. Details: Italian and domestic wool and synthetic blends with a twist of metallic threads Long fringe
